product_name: FENTY BEAUTY by RihannaPro Filt'r Instant Retouch Concealer
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeFENTY BEAUTY by Rihanna's Pro Filt'r Instant Retouch Concealer is a creamy, longwear, creaseproof liquid concealer that delivers light-as-air, medium to full coverage in a groundbreaking range of 50 easy-to-shop soft matte shades.
details: DetailsBenefitsInstantly brightens under eyes, conceals blemishes and dark spots, and reduces rednessMedium to full coverageLongwear, coverage that lasts all daySoft Matte finishCreaseproofSweat-resistantLight-as-air50 shades for all, created to complement your Pro Filt'r foundationFormulated WithoutPhthalatesParabensItem 2592634How To UseApply directly under eyes or over blemishes and blend with the Precision Concealer Brush 180.Start with a very thin layer and build as needed - a little goes a long way!RIHANNA'S WAY: When brightening under eyes, let Pro Filt'r concealer dry completely before setting with Pro Filt'r Instant Retouch Setting Powder. Rihanna likes to set as the very last step in her makeup routine for the best results.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Hydrogenated Didecene, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Cetyl Peg/Ppg-10/1 Dimethicone, Glycerin, Methicone, Nylon-12, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Dimethicone, Sodium Chloride, Acrylates/Polytrimethylsiloxymethacrylate Copolymer, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Hydroxyacetophenone, Lauryl Peg-8 Dimethicone, Hdi/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Talc, Lauroyl Lysine, Combretum Fruticosum Flower Nectar, Alcohol, Butylene Glycol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Centella Asiatica Leaf Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply directly under eyes or over blemishes and blend with the Precision Concealer Brush 180.Start with a very thin layer and build as needed - a little goes a long way!RIHANNA'S WAY: When brightening under eyes, let Pro Filt'r concealer dry completely before setting with Pro Filt'r Instant Retouch Setting Powder. Rihanna likes to set as the very last step in her makeup routine for the best results.

reviews.headline: Everything Fenty
reviews.comments: This product makes my sleepy, dark under eyes look brighter and awake

reviews.headline: Blends
reviews.comments: Works well great product

reviews.headline: I would definitely buy this again!
reviews.comments: I love this I've been using it for about three years! I like how it covers well and it's creamy. The texture is good.

reviews.headline: Test products for your needs, everyone is different
reviews.comments:
I saw bad reviews for this that would've discouraged me from buying had I not been using this product for years. But I honestly think it boils down to skin type & how you use your make up. 

It works well for me, lasts me a long time (I don't wear make up daily) I have combination skin. In the summer I can get pretty oily & in the winter can get pretty dry. I'm also no make up guru. I like quick, simple & natural looking. I think most people complaining are trying to contour & layer & this seems this isn't for that. I personally like that it sets quick bc I have other stuff to do & don't want it coming of. I also use one pump & pat forehead, both cheeks & chin, pat all over while wet, no issues. With the concealer drying quicker too my blemish is covered by the time I come back with my foundation vs some watered down options you have to reconceal 2-3 times. I can also pat my blush & matte powder to keep my forehead from shining no problem. I use eyeshadow very rarely & if you're about anything caking‚Ä¶just use less. It's pretty thick. I have some bad scars & it covers me fine with 1 pump, it goes a long way. 

Reminder, pretty sure you can test at Ulta. Make sure you washed, moisturized & exfoliated for best results. Hope this helps!

So if you want quick, simple coverage, your skin is hydrated, exfoliated & you're okay with patting vs brushing & lots of layering it's a good option imo.

reviews.headline: This Lasted me Through Track
reviews.comments: I run highschool track and today i ran uphill through the rain. Now that rain waw blowing in my face, i was sweating uphill, and i still ran at the track after i ran a mile to get there. After three hours and an 8 hour day of school walking up and down the stairs i looked in the car mirror and i tell you my concelear is still on and covering my eye bags. Lets be so for real i looked flawless. I mean how?!! This concealer is magic you only need a couple dots under your eyes and youll already look like rhianna herself. I 100% recommend to anyone.

reviews.headline: I always buy fenty.  I feel she has the most selections
reviews.comments: I think it makes me look like a million bucks.

reviews.headline: I would always buy this product and it last a long time !
reviews.comments: This product has became my favorite, I bought two so I wouldn't have to share with my daughter. This blends perfectly with our skin .

reviews.headline: My daily go to!
reviews.comments: This concealer matches my skin tone perfectly! I use it all over my face and not just some areas! It looks so natural, people will ask me, am I wearing makeup!

reviews.headline: Love It!
reviews.comments: Great coverage!

reviews.headline: It's good
reviews.comments: Its good

reviews.headline: super dry
reviews.comments: For the positives, the shade range is amazing and I thought the coverage was fine. Onto the negatives, it was SUPER drying and would look cakey after a couple hours (a couple minutes with the wrong powder). It would also dry down super fast, which made it difficult to blend.

reviews.headline: yes
reviews.comments: it cover good

reviews.headline: The worst concealer
reviews.comments: This is the WORST concealer I've ever used. It dries too quickly to work with and is not for all day wear. It creases badly after a few hours of wear even after setting with powder. It is so drying and the finish is blotchy. Absolutely terrible!

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: I love it.  Can't tell I have anything on .  This concealer does not give a  creasing or a cakey look. I would buy again.

reviews.headline: Great coverage & color match
reviews.comments: Great coverage & color match

reviews.headline: No coverage and drying
reviews.comments: It strips my foundation and ends up providing less coverage than before I even put it on. Once I built it up, it looked cakey and dry.

reviews.headline: Yes but the right color
reviews.comments: I purchased the wrong color. It's to dark but it's a very good concealer

reviews.headline: Beautiful  concealer
reviews.comments: I am shade 370 and the color and finish is great.  For reference  I usually  use shape tape tan deep sand, and am 334 in maybelline  fit me.

reviews.headline: My go to
reviews.comments: This is my favorite concealer. Last all night when set with the fenty setting powder.

reviews.headline: love the OG
reviews.comments: i love everything about this concealer from the way it applies, to the shade, and texture. i hope i love the other verison just as much

media.headline: Everything I've needed in a concealer.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I saw bad reviews for this that would've discouraged me from buying had I not been using this product for years. But I honestly think it boils down to skin type & how you use your make up. 

It works well for me, lasts me a long time (I don't wear make up daily) I have combination skin. In the summer I can get pretty oily & in the winter can get pretty dry. I'm also no make up guru. faceoff_positive.headline: Test products for your needs, everyone is different

faceoff_negative.comments:
I wanted to love this so much, queen Ri released one of the most inclusive concealer lines on the market. 
My problem with the concealer:
-It cracks and dries over moisturizer and especially sunscreen. I will do my entire face and add fenty concealer and around my eyes it cracks and separates, and looks like I have flaky skin, just terrible! I've tried mineral SPF, liquid SPF drops, water based moisturizer, oil based moisturizer‚Ä¶ i figured it may be something to do with the formula. Doesn't work with anything, and I am not leaving the house without SPF :/ 
-the shades oxidize, do a patch and wear test in store (1hr) before buying or you'll get the wrong color. 
-expensive for what you get 
-looks cakey and when I have an odd blemish I will try to cover it and it just CLINGS to the blemish making it obvious there's a blemish and makes the skin crusty and gross.
faceoff_negative.headline: Unfortunately the worst concealer I've ever used.
